results.idea: Short-term momentum (z-scored 5-day returns)
results.description: Used multiple fields implicitly (PRICE + RETURNS derived). Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining PRICE-derived RETURNS with cross-sectional zscore. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: data coverage assumed sufficient so ts_backfill not used. SUGGESTION4: favors widely-used PRICE field. Confidence set to 0.65.

results.idea: Mean-reversion using 20-day deviation from moving average
results.description: Combines PRICE and short-term MOVAVG (derived). SUGGESTION1 applied (price vs ts_mean). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3: if coverage low, would apply ts_backfill to PRICE (not applied here). SUGGESTION4: uses high-coverage PRICE. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Volume-weighted breakout (price change * volume surge)
results.description: Uses PRICE and VOLUME as two fields per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. If VOLUME coverage <0.6 would backfill; assumed sufficient. SUGGESTION4: VOLUME typically high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum (post-announcement drift)
results.description: Combines EPS_ACTUAL and EPS_EST (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. If EPS fields sparse, apply ts_backfill — applied when needed. SUGGESTION4: EPS fields lower userCount so confidence reduced. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Analyst revision trend (upgrades momentum)
results.description: Uses ANALYST_REVISION and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. If revision count sparse, ts_backfill considered. SUGGESTION4: analyst fields medium usage; confidence moderate. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Short interest accumulation (rising short interest predicts mean reversion)
results.description: Uses SHORT_INTEREST time-series; SUGGESTION1 single field but temporal structure exploited. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: SHORT_INTEREST has many users; confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Implied vs realized vol divergence (sell when implied >> realized)
results.description: Combines IMPLIED_VOL and REALIZED_VOL (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill applied if either field sparse. SUGGESTION4: vol fields commonly used; confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Order-book imbalance (vector) — buy when bid depth > ask depth
results.description: Uses ORDER_BOOK_VECTOR (vector) and VOLUME. Applied SUGGESTION2 by vec_sum on bid/ask vectors. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. If vector coverage low, ts_backfill considered. SUGGESTION4: order-book data has lower userCount so confidence lower. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: News sentiment surprise (positive sentiment leads to drift)
results.description: Combines NEWS_SENTIMENT and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. If sentiment sparse, ts_backfill used. NEWS_SENTIMENT userCount varies (SUGGESTION4) so confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Liquidity shock detection (low turnover spike)
results.description: Uses VOLUME and MARKET_CAP to detect relative liquidity changes (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. ts_backfill used for sparse MARKET_CAP if needed. MARKET_CAP is high userCount -> improved confidence. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Cross-asset momentum (stock vs sector ETF relative strength)
results.description: Combines PRICE and SECTOR_ETF_PRICE (SUGGESTION1). Group effects considered via normalization. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional if ETF data sparse. SUGGESTION4: ETF fields high coverage; confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Dividend surprise (unexpected yield change signals re-rating)
results.description: Uses DIVIDEND_YIELD and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not applied. DIVIDEND_YIELD is sparse; applied ts_backfill when needed (SUGGESTION3). Lower userCount decreases confidence. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Insider trading momentum (net buys by insiders)
results.description: Uses INSIDER_TRADES (sum of buys minus sells) and PRICE. SUGGESTION1 applied. INSIDER_TRADES sparse so ts_backfill applied when necessary (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: lower userCount; confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Reversal after extreme intraday move (overnight mean reversion)
results.description: Uses PRICE and OVERNIGHT_RETURN (derived) per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields. ts_backfill if overnight data incomplete. High userCount for PRICE helps. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Cross-sectional earnings momentum (rank by recent surprise)
results.description: Uses EPS_SURPRISE and PRICE. Applied SUGGESTION1 and cross-sectional quantile ranking. SUGGESTION2 not used. EPS_SURPRISE sparsity addressed with ts_backfill when needed. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Volatility breakout scalping (short volatility after spike)
results.description: Uses REALIZED_VOL and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. If REALIZED_VOL coverage low, ts_backfill applied. Volatility signals common -> moderate confidence. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with liquidity filter (momentum / illiquidity penalty)
results.description: Combines PRICE momentum and VOLUME or MARKET_CAP as liquidity via SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill available if liquidity fields sparse. SUGGESTION4: uses high-coverage fields; confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Sector dispersion timing (high cross-sectional sector dispersion favors stock picking)
results.description: Uses SECTOR_MEAN_RETURN and STOCK_RETURN (SUGGESTION1). Group usage implied; SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for sector data if needed. Sector grouping increases alpha potency. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Relative strength vs fundamentals (price momentum minus rev growth)
results.description: Combines PRICE momentum and REVENUE_GROWTH (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill applied if REVENUE_GROWTH sparse. SUGGESTION4: fundamentals medium userCount; confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Put/Call skew signal (options sentiment)
results.description: Uses PUT_CALL_RATIO and IMPLIED_VOL (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. If P/C sparse, ts_backfill used. Options fields medium coverage; confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Price impact (large fund flow correlated with price moves)
results.description: Combines FUND_FLOW and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. FUND_FLOW often sparse; ts_backfill applied when needed. SUGGESTION4: lower userCount -> confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Earnings season pair trade (long stocks with positive surprise vs peers)
results.description: Uses EPS_SURPRISE and PEER_GROUP mean via group operators (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill used for sparse EPS. Group operator used but group field as parameter. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by analyst sentiment (momentum * analyst score)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ANALYST_SENTIMENT (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill applied if sentiment sparse. Analyst data medium userCount; confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Seasonality (day-of-week) mean-reversion
results.description: Uses PRICE and ts_step/day counters. SUGGESTION1 applied by using time-series operator ts_step. SUGGESTION2 not relevant. Data coverage assumed sufficient. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cross-sectional volatility-adjusted value (value score / volatility)
results.description: Combines BOOK_TO_MARKET and VOLATILITY (REALIZED_VOL) per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for fundamentals if sparse. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum decay optimization (decay-weighted returns)
results.description: Uses ts_decay_linear on recent returns to tune turnover (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill not applied. SUGGESTION4: uses common returns field -> confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High short interest squeeze candidate (short interest high & rising + price uptick)
results.description: Combines SHORT_INTEREST and PRICE momentum (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill applied if short data sparse. Short interest high userCount improves confidence slightly. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Inventory gluts signal (supply chain metric predicts margin pressure)
results.description: Uses INVENTORY_DAYS and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. INVENTORY_DAYS likely sparse; ts_backfill considered. Lower userCount reduces confidence. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Macro sensitivity overlay (stock beta to bond yields)
results.description: Combines PRICE returns and BOND_YIELD (SUGGESTION1). ts_regression can estimate sensitivity. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for yields if sparse. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum z-score within sector (group_rank)
results.description: Uses PRICE returns and SECTOR group (SUGGESTION1). group_rank applied to capture intra-sector leaders. SUGGESTION2 not used. group field used properly. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings estimate momentum (rising EPS_EST suggests re-rating)
results.description: Uses EPS_EST and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. If EPS_EST sparse, ts_backfill used. EPS_EST userCount moderate; confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Price-volume divergence (price up but volume down indicates weak move)
results.description: Combines PRICE returns and VOLUME change (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for volume if needed. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by analyst coverage (higher alpha where coverage low)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ANALYST_COVERAGE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION4: prefers high userCount but intentionally uses low-coverage signal to capture mispricing; ts_backfill considered. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Cross-sectional growth surprise (rev growth vs estimate)
results.description: Uses REVENUE_ACTUAL and REVENUE_EST (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for sparse revenue fields applied if necessary. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Implied volatility term-structure steepness (short-term vs long-term IV)
results.description: Uses IMPLIED_VOL_SHORT and IMPLIED_VOL_LONG (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill when either IV sparse. Options IV commonly used; confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Cross-sectional earnings yield momentum (earnings yield vs price momentum)
results.description: Combines EARNINGS_YIELD and PRICE momentum per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 not used. EARNINGS_YIELD sometimes sparse: ts_backfill applied when needed. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum after buyback announcement (buybacks lead to positive drift)
results.description: Uses SHARE_CHANGE (buybacks) and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SHARE_CHANGE sparse -> ts_backfill when needed. SUGGESTION4: buyback signals medium userCount. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Cross-sectional skewness of returns (high negative skew signals mean-reversion)
results.description: Uses ts_kurtosis or skew (ts_kurtosis) and PRICE returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 not used. Use ts_backfill if return windows have NaNs. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by ESG controversy (avoid momentum with poor ESG)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ESG_SCORE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ESG_SCORE coverage varies; ts_backfill applied if helpful. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: High turnover breakout (persistent high turnover with positive returns)
results.description: Uses VOLUME and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for volume when needed. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Mean reversion in low-volatility stocks (stronger revert when vol low)
results.description: Combines REALIZED_VOL and PRICE deviation (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for vol if required. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Cross-sectional distress signal (high default spread predicts poor returns)
results.description: Uses CORP_SPREAD and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. CORP_SPREAD sometimes sparse; ts_backfill applied. Lower userCount reduces confidence. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Pair trade based on fundamental divergence within peers
results.description: Uses PRICE and FUNDAMENTAL_RATIO (PE or EV/EBITDA) (SUGGESTION1). Pair constructed by subtracting peer group mean. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for fundamentals if sparse. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum persistence via ts_ir (information ratio over time)
results.description: Uses ts_ir on short returns; SUGGESTION1 applied to time-series operator. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill not applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional earnings quality (accruals vs cash flow)
results.description: Combines ACCRUAL_RATIO and CASH_FLOW (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. Fundamental fields often sparse; ts_backfill considered. Confidence 0.36.

results.idea: Reaction to macro surprises (GDP/CPI surprise correlated with certain sectors)
results.description: Uses MACRO_SURPRISE and SECTOR returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. Macro data low frequency; ts_backfill not applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Momentum combined with low analyst dispersion (more reliable momentum)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ANALYST_STDDEV (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for analyst dispersion if needed. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Cross-sectional trade using group_neutralize (neutralize sector effects)
results.description: Uses PRICE alpha and group_neutralize by SECTOR to remove sector bias (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. Group operator used correctly per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large realized skew moves
results.description: Uses ts_kurtosis(ts_returns) and PRICE. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for returns if necessary. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by positive earnings revisions
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ANALYST_REVISION (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill if revision sparse. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Liquidity-provision signal (bid-ask spread shrinkage)
results.description: Uses BID_ASK_SPREAD and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. If spread data sparse, ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cross-sectional carry (dividend yield minus funding cost)
results.description: Combines DIVIDEND_YIELD and REPO_RATE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill applied for sparse dividend data. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Sector momentum rotation (rank sectors by trailing returns)
results.description: Uses SECTOR returns and group_cartesian_product if combining groups (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for sector returns optional. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum signal filtered by option open interest (confirm liquidity)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and OPTION_OI (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. OPTION_OI should be backfilled if sparse. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Cross-sectional return dispersion timing (high dispersion -> stock picking)
results.description: Uses market-wide RETURN_DISPERSION and individual returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum decay tail risk control (hump to reduce turnover)
results.description: Uses ts_returns(PRICE) and hump operator to limit turnover (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. hump reduces trading cost risk. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional signal using ts_quantile (stable ranks)
results.description: Uses PRICE returns and ts_quantile to get stable ranking (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill not applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Mean reversion after large analyst downgrades (short downgrades)
results.description: Combines ANALYST_REVISION and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION3: backfilled if sparse. Analyst fields medium userCount; confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cross-sectional capitalization-weighted mispricing (small caps mean-revert)
results.description: Uses MARKET_CAP and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. MARKET_CAP high coverage per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum vs realized skew (avoid momentum when skew negative)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ts_kurtosis (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill if returns window sparse. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cross-sectional growth/momentum blend (blend of rev growth & returns)
results.description: Combines REVENUE_GROWTH and PRICE returns per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for revenue if sparse. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low news negativity
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and NEWS_NEGATIVITY (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for news data when sparse. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Cross-sectional carry via yield curve exposure
results.description: Uses BOND_YIELD and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. Macro yield coverage high; confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum with group_scale weighting (normalize within sector)
results.description: Uses PRICE returns and group_scale by SECTOR (SUGGESTION1). group operator used per KEEP_IN_MIND4. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cross-sectional value reversal (cheap stocks outperform after short-term weakness)
results.description: Combines BOOK_TO_MARKET and short-term returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for fundamentals if needed. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by institutional ownership change
results.description: Combines INSTITUTIONAL_OWNERSHIP_CHANGE and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). Ownership data may be sparse so ts_backfill applied conditionally. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCount; confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large option gamma shifts
results.description: Uses OPTION_GAMMA and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. Option Greeks can be sparse; ts_backfill applied if needed. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Momentum with volatility targeting (scale by inverse vol)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and REALIZED_VOL (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for vol optional. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Earnings momentum gated by revenue surprise magnitude
results.description: Uses EPS_SURPRISE and REVENUE_SURPRISE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. Both fields can be sparse; ts_backfill applied when available. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum using quantile buckets (top decile long)
results.description: Uses PRICE returns and quantile bucketing per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 not used. Simple and robust; uses common fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum fade after earnings drift exhaustion (ts_arg_max detection)
results.description: Uses ts_arg_max on intraday or short returns and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum with downside protection (tail operator to cap extremes)
results.description: Uses ts_returns(PRICE) and tail operator to limit extreme exposures (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not relevant. tail reduces drawdown risk. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum neutralized to size and sector (group_neutralize both)
results.description: Uses ts_returns(PRICE) and group_neutralize by SECTOR and SIZE group (SUGGESTION1). Applied group operators per KEEP_IN_MIND4. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large block trades (block trade flow signal)
results.description: Uses BLOCK_TRADES_FLOW and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). BLOCK_TRADES_FLOW sparse -> ts_backfill when needed. SUGGESTION4: lower userCount reduces confidence. Confidence 0.39.

results.idea: Momentum with earnings momentum overlay (positive earnings revisions amplify momentum)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ANALYST_REVISION (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill if revision sparse. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Cross-sectional signal using ts_rank over longer window to capture trend
results.description: Uses ts_rank on PRICE over long window (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Volatility breakout with group_zscore filter (avoid sector-wide moves)
results.description: Uses REALIZED_VOL and group_zscore by SECTOR (SUGGESTION1). group operator used per KEEP_IN_MIND4. SUGGESTION3 not used. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Cross-sectional mean-reversion using group_mean violation (stock deviates from industry mean)
results.description: Uses PRICE deviation from group_mean(PRICE) (SUGGESTION1). Group usage correct. SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by free float (smaller free float increases effect)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and FREE_FLOAT (SUGGESTION1). FREE_FLOAT sometimes sparse -> ts_backfill considered. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Cross-sectional signal from analyst target price revision
results.description: Uses TARGET_PRICE_REVISION and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). Target revisions can be sparse; ts_backfill used when necessary. SUGGESTION4: medium userCount; confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Momentum with skew guard (avoid stocks with increasing put buying)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and PUT_CALL_RATIO (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill if options data sparse. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cross-sectional signal using ts_max_diff to capture drawdown depth
results.description: Uses ts_max_diff(PRICE, d) and momentum (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum combined with cash-flow surprise
results.description: Uses CASH_FLOW_SURPRISE and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). Cash flow data can be sparse; ts_backfill applied where needed. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cross-sectional use of ts_product for compounding short-term signals
results.description: Uses ts_product on returns over short window to capture compounded moves (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill if NaNs present. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum hardened by low idiosyncratic volatility (IVOL)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and IDIOSYNCRATIC_VOL (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill for IVOL if needed. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: News volume surge confirming momentum (sentiment * news volume)
results.description: Uses NEWS_SENTIMENT and NEWS_VOLUME (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. News data may be sparse; ts_backfill applied conditionally. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Cross-sectional price inefficiency after index reconstitution (inflows/outflows)
results.description: Uses INDEX_INFLOW and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). Inflow data lower frequency; ts_backfill considered. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Momentum combined with balance-sheet improvements (decreasing leverage)
results.description: Uses LEVERAGE_CHANGE and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). Fundamentals sparse -> ts_backfill considered. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Cross-sectional pair trade using spread vs historical covariance (ts_covariance)
results.description: Uses ts_covariance between two peer prices to identify mean-reverting pairs (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum with weighting by vec_avg(order-book depth) (vector)
results.description: Uses ORDER_BOOK_VECTOR and PRICE. Applied SUGGESTION2 (vec_avg) to summarize vector. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. If vector coverage low, ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cross-sectional signal using ts_arg_min to find recent bottoms
results.description: Uses ts_arg_min on PRICE and then rank (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by corporate actions (avoid when upcoming dilutive events)
results.description: Uses CORPORATE_ACTION_FLAG and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). Corporate action flags sparse -> ts_backfill when available. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by analyst consensus dispersion (more reliable when dispersion low)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and ANALYST_DISPERSION (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill applied for dispersion if needed. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cross-sectional rotate into high free-cash-flow growers with momentum
results.description: Uses FREE_CASH_FLOW_GROWTH and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). Fundamental field may be sparse; ts_backfill applied if possible. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Momentum with tail-risk control via winsorize
results.description: Applies winsorize to ts_returns to reduce outliers (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. winsorize reduces extreme impacts improving robustness. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Short-term reversal at extreme ranked quantiles
results.description: Uses quantile ranking of short returns and reverses extremes (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Cross-sectional signal using ts_std_dev to detect volatility contraction breakouts
results.description: Uses ts_std_dev on returns and momentum (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by shareholder activism signals
results.description: Uses ACTIVIST_INVESTMENT_FLAG and PRICE returns (SUGGESTION1). Activist events sparse; ts_backfill applied when available. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Cross-sectional value momentum using group_zscore on valuation metrics
results.description: Uses VALUATION_METRIC (e.g., EV/EBITDA) and group_zscore by INDUSTRY (SUGGESTION1). group operator used properly. ts_backfill for fundamentals when necessary. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum with earnings season timing (boost near favorable earnings dates)
results.description: Combines ts_returns(PRICE) and DAYS_TO_EARNINGS (SUGGESTION1). DAYS_TO_EARNINGS low-frequency -> ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum using ts_scale to normalize time-series ranges
results.description: Uses ts_scale on returns to make signals comparable across stocks (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Volatility breakout pair: long low-vol breakout vs short sector
results.description: Combines REALIZED_VOL, PRICE and sector group (SUGGESTION1). Group operators used to form hedges. ts_backfill for vol when needed. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum using ts_delay to capture delayed reactions
results.description: Uses ts_delay on news or revisions and PRICE (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2 not used. ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Momentum with group_count filter (only trade where peer group has sufficient coverage)
results.description: Uses ts_returns(PRICE) and group_count to ensure robust group signals (SUGGESTION1). group_count used per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Confidence 0.58.
